Hardcoded
Config:
Zone <- Target temp; temp sensor; actuator(s)

div.p: 1. Robust. Heating keeps working during WiFi, Zigbee, Home-Assistant failure/upgrade. Separate, dedicated hardware.
2. Low maintenance. Few dependencies as possible.
